title: Indian-style grilled chicken breasts
ingredients: ['4 skinless boneless chicken breasts fillets, about 140 g (5 oz) each', 'sunflower oil for brushing', 'lemon or lime wedges to serve', 'sprigs of fresh coriander to garnish', 'Yogurt marinade', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 tbsp finely chopped fresh root ginger', '1½ tsp tomato purée', '1½ tsp garam masala', '1½ tsp ground coriander', '1½ tsp ground cumin', '¼ tsp turmeric', 'pinch of cayenne pepper, or to taste', '100 g (3½ oz) plain low-fat yogurt', 'Raita (see our recipe on this site)']
